answers.transgender_6_8_christian: Some people know they are boys, girls, or neither—this is called their gender. We use the name and pronouns a person asks for. It is never okay to tease or hurt someone because of who they are. Christian families can have different views. We follow kindness and fairness toward everyone. If you are unsure, talk with a trusted adult like a parent or teacher. Different families may explain gender in different ways; we still show kindness.
